name: Is the Game Over?
description:
Back and forth and back and forth and back and forth.
This is the basic principle behind Is the Game Over

Play the same level over and over as it gets progressively harder; Everytime you reach the green door, it moves to the other side of the room, and you must reach it again. This time, however, a random obstacle has been added in your way.

The overly-simple, small list of controls:

ActionsKeyLeft
ARightDJumpWGet off of the Game Over screen
Space
